entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
